mapper.select: SELECT * FROM V_POWER_LIST WHERE S_STATUS='U' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN POWER_START AND POWER_END
SELECT MAX(POWER_END) FROM POWERSERVICE WHERE SER_CODE = #{ser_code} AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < POWER_END
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POWERSERVICE VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(POWER_CODE),0)+1 FROM POWERSERVICE ), #{s_email}, #{ser_code}, #{power_start}, to_date(#{power_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+6, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{power_price})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM POWERSERVICE GROUP BY POWER_START HAVING POWER_START= TO_CHAR(#{power_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT S.SER_TITLE, S.SER_IMG,S.SER_PRICE, S.SER_LINE, P.* , (SELECT CAT_NAME FROM CATEGORY C WHERE S.SER_CATE = C.CAT_NO) as cat_name, (SELECT SUB_NAME FROM SUB_CATEGORY SC WHERE S.SER_SUB_CATE = SC.SUB_NO) as sub_name, (SELECT COUNT(SCODE) FROM REVIEW WHERE SCODE=S.SER_CODE) as reviewcount, (SELECT AVG(REV_RATE) FROM REVIEW WHERE SCODE=S.SER_CODE) as reviewavg FROM SERVICE S, POWERSERVICE P WHERE S.SER_CODE = P.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email} ORDER BY P.POWER_START DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT S.SER_TITLE, S.SER_IMG,S.SER_PRICE, S.SER_LINE, P.* , (SELECT CAT_NAME FROM CATEGORY C WHERE S.SER_CATE = C.CAT_NO) as cat_name, (SELECT SUB_NAME FROM SUB_CATEGORY SC WHERE S.SER_SUB_CATE = SC.SUB_NO) as sub_name, (SELECT COUNT(SCODE) FROM REVIEW WHERE SCODE=S.SER_CODE) as reviewcount, (SELECT AVG(REV_RATE) FROM REVIEW WHERE SCODE=S.SER_CODE) as reviewavg FROM SERVICE S, POWERSERVICE P WHERE S.SER_CODE = P.SER_CODE AND S.S_EMAIL = #{s_email} ORDER BY P.POWER_START DESC )
